about_the_game:
Boats. Crabs. Fishing. Ocean. Customizations. Free. It goes on and on. Stop reading, just download now!

uCaptain gives you what you want in a fishing game:

Complete control over how you build, setup, and sail your boat, 60+ different species of wildlife to catch, tons of challenges to complete, and an open-world so you can explore the vast ocean how you want.


BUILD YOUR BOAT

You build your boat the way you want. You have total control over the gear you carry- shrimp nets, scallop dredges, crab pots, lobster traps, long lines... you name it- it's included!


HUNT LEGENDARY FISH

Featuring the most realistic fishing game simulation put on a mobile device, customize every aspect of your gear setup- from setting the drag of your casting reel, to changing your lures to target the fish you want to catch. You can fish various species like largemouth bass, smallmouth bass, pike, musky, walleye, blue fin tuna, mahi mahi, marlin, swordfish, sailfish! Can you catch all 60 different fish species?


SEEK THE DEADLIEST CATCH

Gear up, fuel up, and steam ahead to the dangerous waters of the Bering Sea! Plot your route, set your traps, and catch the most prized crabs and fish in the world. Survive and thrive...and your vast fortune is yours to claim!


EXPLORE AN OPEN OCEAN

With the largest map ever put in a mobile game (250+ sq miles) you can sail your ship across the world's most famous fishing ports- from the warm waters of Venice, Louisiana to the icy seas of Dutch Harbor, Alaska.


Go on an adventure - make a fortune!

uCaptain is a fishing game designed for those who like fishing adventures, action games, simulation games, competition and outdoors! This is the ultimate fishing game, don’t miss out!

*Plus It’s got a ship-shipping ship, shipping shipping ships

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core 64-bit Intel or AMD processor, 2.4 GHZ CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 11 dedicated video card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
